text: Keep the Faith is the fifth studio album by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and was released on November 3, 1992 through Mercury Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Finland and the United Kingdom. It went to number 2 in Austria and Germany, number 3 in Hungary, Japan, the Netherlands, Sweden and Switzerland, number 5 in the United States, number 7 in Norway, number 9 in Canada and number 15 in New Zealand. == Track listing == Category:1992 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
title: Keep the Faith
